import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; // import Background from './types/Background'; import Hero from './types/Hero'; import Mockups from './types/Mockups'; import './style.css'; function Work() { // project modifiers const [recipeMod, setRecipeMod] = useState(0); const [porefectionMod, setPorefectionMod] = useState(0); const [weatherMod, setWeatherMod] = useState(0); const [blogMod, setBlogeMod] = useState(0); const [mavenMod, setMavenMod] = useState(0); const [propertyMod, setPropertyMod] = useState(0); console.log(recipeMod); // parallax effect const handleScroll = () => { // get elements from the page const recipe = document.getElementById('recipe').getBoundingClientRect().top; const porefection = document.getElementById('porefection').getBoundingClientRect().top; const weather = document.getElementById('weather').getBoundingClientRect().top; const blog = document.getElementById('blog').getBoundingClientRect().top; const maven = document.getElementById('maven').getBoundingClientRect().top; const property = document.getElementById('property').getBoundingClientRect().top; // arrays of all elements and state setters const allPositions = [recipe, porefection, weather, blog, maven, property]; const setAllMods = [setRecipeMod, setPorefectionMod, setWeatherMod, setBlogeMod, setMavenMod, setPropertyMod]; // set parallax variables let offset; let moveSpeed; if (window.innerWidth > 768) { offset = window.innerHeight / 4; moveSpeed = 1; } else if (window.innerWidth > 480) { offset = window.innerHeight / 3; moveSpeed = 0.8; } else { offset = -window.innerHeight / 4; moveSpeed = 0.4; } // set parallax modifier for (let i = 0; i < allPositions.length; i++) { if (allPositions[i] < offset) { setAllMods[i]((window.innerHeight - offset) * moveSpeed); } else if (allPositions[i] < window.innerHeight) { setAllMods[i]((window.innerHeight - allPositions[i]) * moveSpeed); } } }; useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); handleScroll(); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); return (
{/* banner */}

Hi, my name is Eli.

I'm always open to new opportunities. Check out my portfolio {window.innerWidth >= 768 &&
} and let me know if you're interested in working together.

{/* work */} {/* recipe generator */}

Recipe Generator

Users can find inspiration for their next meal by randomly generating recipes with sorting logic to filter their results by course and/or dietary restrictions and an engaging, intuitive user experience.

Deployed Application

GitHub Repository
{/* social network api */}

Social Network API

This Social Network API uses MongoDB to build the foundation for a NoSQL social network. Out of the box, users are able to share thoughts, react to thoughts, and connect with friends.

GitHub Repository
{/* e-commerce backend */}

E-Commerce Backend

This strictly backend e-commerce application allows the user to easily manage their inventory with a MySQL database or lays a solid foundation for a developer planning to build a full stack e-commerce platform.

GitHub Repository
{/* porefection */}

Porefection

This web application helps users manage their skincare routine by allowing them to create a detailed list of their skincare products. When the user adds a product to their list, detailed product information is fetched from Sephora API and the list is automatically sorted in the correct order for using the products.

Deployed Application

GitHub Repository

Made with React

{/* maven group */}

Real Estate Team Websites

Promotional websites for real estate teams, serving as the first point of contact for potential clients and showcase for the services and success of the team.

Live Website
{/* property website */}

Property Websites

One of many websites showcasing a property for sale or for rent, featuring all important property details, engaging potential customers and funneling high value traffic.

Live Website
{/* weather dashboard */}

Weather Dashboard

Full bleed background images and a clear, engaging user interface deliver a 5-day forecast utilizing powerful integrations from the Google Maps API and OpenWeather.

Deployed Application

GitHub Repository
{/* blog template */}

Blog Template

Free template for developers building a blog based on a MySQL database with complex relationships, including multiple users with hashed passwords powered by bcrypt.

Deployed Application

GitHub Repository
); } export default Work;
